title: Tesla's Elon Musk heads to Hollywood to unveil his robotaxi - and face a long list of questions
description: Tesla's CEO, Elon Musk, will unveil a new robotaxi called Cybercab at Warner Bros Hollywood studio. This ambitious project aims to allow self-driving cars to operate as cabs on a ride-hailing network. Musk plans to turn Tesla into an AI robotics company, despite the challenges and regulatory hurdles this technology faces.
